patterns.pattern: @ESTRING:email_qid::@ to=@ESTRING:email_recipient:,@ delay=@ESTRING:email_delivery_delay:,@ xdelay=@ESTRING:email_transmit_delay:,@ mailer=esmtp, pri=@ESTRING:email_priority:,@ relay=@ESTRING:email_relay:,@ dsn=@ESTRING:email_dsn:,@ stat=@ANYSTRING:email_status@
